publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3758 Sandra White: The Glasgow School of Art Embarks on a New Era—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of the Glasgow School of Art’s international search for the architects to design and deliver Phase 1 of its Garnethill estate redevelopment and believes that this major capital investment, which aims to be a model of sustainability, will provide the Glasgow School of Art with world-class facilities for teaching and research and significantly enhance the setting of the Mackintosh building for the benefit of the residents of Garnethill and the many thousands of tourists who visit the Mackintosh building every year. Supported by: Aileen Campbell*, Robert Brown*, Bill Kidd*, Anne McLaughlin*, Kenneth Gibson*, Rob Gibson*, Robin Harper*, Bob Doris*
S3M-3758 The Glasgow School of Art Embarks on a New Era (lodged on 20 March 2009) Ken Macintosh*, Stuart McMillan*, Pauline McNeill*
